programme.title: Rush Hour 3

programme.title: Rampage

programme.title: Suicide Squad

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code

programme.title: Brightburn

programme.desc: When terrorists suddenly invade the White House, police officer John Cale springs into action to protect his daughter and the President of the United States.

programme.title: The Water Horse

programme.title: The Intern

programme.title: The Sisterhood of The Traveling Pants
programme.desc: Four best friends spend their first summer apart. In a bid to stay connected with each other, they pass around a pair of denims that fits each one of them, despite their different body structures.

programme.title: Jumanji

programme.title: Taxi Driver

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: After designing a social networking website along with his friend, Mark Zuckerberg's relationship with the people around him gets affected as the venture turns out to be successful.

programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: As WWII comes to an end, Aatami Korpi trudges towards retirement with a bag full of gold. However, when a Nazi soldier learns about the treasure, he chases after the warrior, unaware of his prowess.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: Father Gabriele Amorth, an exorcist, uncovers a hidden conspiracy as he investigates the horrifying possession of a young boy.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker is dissatisfied with life when he loses his job, the love of his life and his powers. Amid all the chaos, he must fight Doctor Octavius, who threatens to destroy New York City.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna, a 16-year-old who is raised by her father to be the perfect assassin, goes on a mission which takes her across Europe. However, she must avoid being captured by Marissa, a ruthless CIA agent.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Abby Knight, a flower shop owner, who happens to be an ex-attorney, investigates the murder of an unwanted wedding crasher.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: The Ghostbusters are out of business due to being sued for property damage from their last adventure. However, a surge in supernatural activity leads to their services being needed once again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: While trying to escape the evil wizard Gargamel, the blue-skinned Smurfs get sucked into a vortex that teleports them to New York. Thereafter, they try their best to find a way back home.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: A special team of arcade gamers is put together to fight a mysterious alien race that watches classic games of the '80s and presumes them to be a declaration of war.

programme.title: The 6th Day

programme.title: Half Past Dead

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Alice wakes up to find that Raccoon city is infested with zombies and monsters. Later, she tries her best to find a way out of the city before it is too late.

programme.title: Miss Bala

programme.title: You Got Served

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: A Marine sniper is forced to team up with a convict on death-row to take out a rogue general as he is committing various inhumane acts on a certain ethnic group.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish

programme.title: Sniper 3

programme.desc: A woman wakes up in a bunker with two men who claim that the world is destroyed by an attack and then, she escapes and discovers aliens outside.

programme.title: Fly Me To The Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break the family curse that ends every first marriage in divorce in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: When an ex-convict returns home to solve his sister's murder, the authority forces him to go undercover to help them bust illegal activities at a nightclub.

programme.title: Love Is In The Air
programme.desc: Antoine, a lawyer from New York, travels to France for the final round of a job interview. On the flight, he is seated next to Julie, his ex-girlfriend, with whom he has to make awkward conversation.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: When a group of evildoers steal the sun, the guardians of the moon and the sun set out on a journey to fight against the group and retrieve the sun.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, the killings resume and are very similar to the style of Reese.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker observes the mannerisms, daily activities and adventures of five wild brown bears in the Kamchatka Peninsula.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The workers at a dye firm are depressed after learning that their employer has reduced their pay and recruited Manchu executives. However, a con artist assists them in obtaining their full salary.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Maggie Gilkeson is forced to take the help of her estranged father Samuel Jones in order to rescue her daughter who is kidnapped by Pesh-Chidin and his followers.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five civilians turn heroes to save the people of Moscow city from an alien invasion. They soon learn that the invasion is worldwide and begin to discover a way to kill the aliens.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: Hoping to spend Christmas with his estranged wife, detective John McClane arrives in LA. However, he learns about a hostage situation in an office building and his wife is one of the hostages.

programme.title: Vampires Suck
programme.desc: A teenager must choose between a vampire and a werewolf, both of whom try to woo her. To make matters worse, she must deal with her controlling father and a group of killer vampires on the loose.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: Three kung fu students are determined to avenge their master after being beaten by a stranger and venture out to learn new skills in pursuit of revenge.

programme.title: Piranha 3D
programme.desc: After an earthquake splits a lake floor, a swarm of ancient piranhas are released. A group of strangers come together to stop themselves from becoming the victims of these deadly predators.

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: Daniel, along with his friends Adrian and Doyle, kidnaps a wealthy businessman with the intention of extorting money. However, the plan soon backfires owing to the trio's foolishness.

programme.title: Unsane
programme.desc: Sawyer Valentini involuntarily admits herself to a mental care institution. She soon realises that one of the staff members is a dangerous stalker and tries to prove her sanity before it is too late.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Snipped In The Bud
programme.desc: Abby happens to meet her old rival while delivering a bouquet of roses ordered by an anonymous person. However, things get worse when the man is later found dead and all evidence points to Abby.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Here Comes The Boom
programme.desc: Scott, a biology teacher, decides to become an MMA fighter and earn money for his school's extracurricular activities programme after he learns that it is in danger of being cut.

programme.title: Baby Geniuses
programme.desc: Two evil scientists hold babies as captives in their laboratory in order to crack the code to baby talk. However, one of the infants escapes and attempts to rescue the rest with some help.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Gargamel learns that Smurfette knows a secret spell that can turn Naughties, Smurf-like creatures, into real Smurfs, he kidnaps her. The Smurfs set out to rescue Smurfette.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio jockey becomes depressed after a flippant comment on air leads to a shooting spree. He then tries to redeem himself by trying to help one of the victims.

programme.title: Guardians The Superheroes
programme.desc: During the Cold War, a scientist creates a team of superheroes in a secret science laboratory. When he turns villainous, the group unites to save the world from a disaster.

programme.title: Exorcist: The Beginning
programme.desc: While doing missionary work in Africa, Father Lankester Merrin comes across a boy who is behaving strangely. Further investigation reveals that he is possessed by an ancient demon.

programme.title: Breakin' All The Rules
programme.desc: After unexpectedly getting dumped by his fiancee, Quincy Watson becomes a bestselling author by channeling his heartbreak into a book on how to end relationships.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Dating Is Murder
programme.desc: Hailey, a therapist and former prosecutor, investigates a series of unsolved missing persons cases linked to a dating app. Soon, she creates a fake profile on the app to track down the perpetrator.

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: Abel Turner, a prejudiced LAPD officer, terrorises Chris and Lisa Mattson, his new neighbours, as they are an interracial married couple.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word
programme.desc: Abby's vintage car gets damaged when it is hit by a reckless driver. She teams up with Marco, a former private investigator, to find the culprit.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.

programme.title: Soul Surfer
programme.desc: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton loses an arm in a shark attack while at sea. However, her passion for surfing pushes her to attempt to return to the sport at the competition level.

programme.title: Lords Of Dogtown
programme.desc: Three young pioneering skateboarders swiftly rise to stardom. However, they soon find their brotherhood threatened as they face different challenges in their personal lives.

programme.title: It Could Happen To You
programme.desc: Charlie promises to offer his lottery prize to Yvonne, a waitress, in exchange of a tip. Fortunately, he wins the money and decides to fulfil his promise, which disgusts his wife Muriel.

programme.title: Postcards From The Edge
programme.desc: Suzanne, an actress recovering from drug addiction, is asked by her production company to stay put with her mother, a former actress and champion drinker, who still treats her like a child.

programme.title: Pinocchio
programme.desc: Geppetto, a poor carpenter, carves a wooden puppet named Pinocchio who comes to life. But when Pinocchio decides to skip school, he gets kidnapped, leading to a series of misadventures.

programme.title: City Of Hope
programme.desc: After quitting his contractor's job, Nick Rinaldi pursues a life of petty crime and love. Meanwhile, an idealistic politician is torn between the truth and politics.

programme.title: Austenland
programme.desc: Owing to her obsession for Jane Austen's 'Pride and Prejudice', Jane, a thirty-year-old woman, embarks on a vacation to a Jane Austen-theme park in order to look for her soulmate.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

programme.title: 8MM
programme.desc: Tom Welles, a private detective, is approached by a wealthy widow, Mrs Christian, who wants him to determine whether an 8MM film, showing the murder of a girl, is authentic.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: Agra, India: With its earliest reference in the Indian epic Mahabharata, Agra still tells its tales of glorious history through majestic forts, palaces and traditions.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.desc: Scenic Lakes: Tranquillity, scenic nature and harmony are the three attributes of sparkling and serene lakes. The host explores five of the most beautiful and shimmering lakes and salty seascapes.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Resavska Pecina, Serbia: Heather visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves and ends her tour with a joyride onboard the Sargan Eight rail line in Serbia.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: New Taipei City, Taiwan: Alex visits a fish market in New Taipei and explores Fort San Domingo. He visits the Gold Museum and New Taipei Yingge Ceramics Museum before heading to Jiufen village.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: Valley Of Flowers: Explore the Valley of Flowers, a World Heritage Site, which is situated in the Himalayas. It lay frozen during the winters, but completely transforms with the advent of summer.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Verinag: Explore the breathtaking beauty of Verinag in Jammu and Kashmir, India.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Wild Atlantic Way: The team explores the ancient castles of Ireland and relishes the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey: Turkey is the perfect place for some adventure and old charm with its rugged landscapes, carved castles and varied mezze. Hot air ballooning is a sport favoured by tourists.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.desc: Hong Kong; Five Must Sees: The team lists the top five places to see in Hong Kong, one of the most coveted tourist destinations, that is known for its culture and balanced lifestyle.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sjenica, Serbia: Heather visits the Uvac canyon and tries some locally prepared pie before exploring the Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Thali - The Great Indian Meal
programme.desc: Iranian & Bahubali: Rohan visits The Bohri Kitchen in Mumbai to try the Bohri thali, then visits SodaBottleOpenerWala for a Parsi meal, ending with a Bahubali Thali at a Punjabi restaurant in Pune.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: Roman Baths: Of all the leisure activities, bathing was the most important for the Romans. Lying in the heart of the city of Bath, the Roman Baths were constructed around 70 AD.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Old Town Clock: The astronomical clock in Prague, Czech Republic, displays various celestial objects and provides a glimpse into the history of the place.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Belfast: Northern Ireland is known for its spectacular landscapes; Belfast offers visitors a plethora of urban vistas.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Seychelles: With its rich folk traditions of dance and music, as well as its biodiversity, this archipelago is the perfect culmination of fun and frolic to the hilt.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Belgrade, Serbia: Heather explores Belgrade and learns about its architecture and past by visiting historical monuments built during the Roman, Hungarian and Turkish era.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Gouda, Netherlands: Alex tries Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Museum Prinsenhof Delft and visits the local cheese market in Gouda.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Addis Ababa, Ethiopia: Addis Ababa, the capital city of Ethiopia, runs eight years behind the world due to different calculations influenced by the Coptic and the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahido Church.

programme.title: Xplore Oman
programme.desc: Muscat: Explore Muscat for its eminent flavour of an ancient and prosperous civilisation. It also covers the Sultan Qaboos Mosque, the Muttrah Souq and the Ras Al Jinz beach and nature reserve.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Jaipur: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan's capital city.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Copenhagen: Originally a Viking fishing village, Copenhagen, the capital of Denmark, is a culturally rich city where the air is vibrant with flavours of the past and promise of the future.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Novi Sad, Serbia: Heather visits Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia, and canoes on the Danube.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Taipei City, Taiwan: Alex visits the Modern Toilet Restaurant which is known for serving strange-looking delicacies and visits Taipei 101 and travels on a city bus.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Gondar, Ethiopia: The host visits Gondar, the city in Ethiopia, that runs eight years behind the world due to different calculations influenced by the Coptic and the Ethiopian churches.

programme.title: Xplore Oman
programme.desc: Fins: There are places in Oman that are still untouched by tourist wagons such as Fins, Wadi Tiwi, Wadi Bani Khalid and the Wahiba sand dunes.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Bikaner: From miniature paintings on palace walls to elaborate havelis, Asmita finds out that Bikaner is an art lover's paradise.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Kandy: When one wakes up to a sparkling bright morning in Kandy, Sri Lanka, one knows that they are on a unique excursion.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Pozarevac, Serbia: Heather visits Pozarevac before exploring the ancient town of Viminacium and the National Museum. She concludes her day with a trip to Rajko's Cave in Majdanpek.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Taichung, Taiwan: Alex explores the local tea gardens and Feng Chia Night Market in Taichung before visiting the 921 Museum and Miyahara dessert parlor.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Axum, Ethiopia: The host visits Aksum, a city in northern Ethiopia, which is famous for its tall, carved obelisks, relics of the ancient Kingdom of Aksum.

programme.title: Xplore Oman
programme.desc: Wadi Bin Khalid: Apart from deserts, Oman also has majestic, rust-colored mountain ranges, which quietly hold the country's history in them.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.desc: Kumarakom, Kerala: Nestled on the serene banks of Lake Vembanad, Kumarakom Lake Resort is cocooned by nature. It is renowned as one of the finest luxury heritage resorts in India.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.desc: One and only Reethi Rah 1: Amidst the leisurely air of Maldives, surrounded by piercing blue waters, is the magical fantasy called Reethi Rah Hotels.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Majdanpek, Serbia: The host explores Majdanpek, a city that showcases the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside, before learning more about Roman history in Serbia.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Tainan, Taiwan: Alex explores Nantou County and Tainan, starting with a resort and tries some local delicacies before visiting the Sun Moon Lake.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Omo Valley, Ethiopia: The host visits the Omo Valley in southern Ethiopia which is the largest river outside the Nile Basin and meets a tribal community.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Dublin: Dublin is known as the UNESCO City of Literature and is the treasure trove of Guinness.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.desc: Sarovar Premier, Kerala: God's own country Kerala has a lot to offer its visitors along with its exotic beaches, tropical backwaters and rejuvenation therapies of Ayurveda.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Galway: The team drives along the world's longest defined coastal route from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun

programme.desc: One and only Reethi Rah 2: Amidst the leisurely air of Maldives, surrounded by piercing blue waters, is the one and only Reethi Rah hotels.

programme.title: Rudraksh
programme.desc: Bhuria (Sunil Shetty) a contract labourer finds a sacred Rudraksh possessed by Raavan the demon king and thereby acquires supernatural powers. He tries to establish his rule over the universe but is stopped by Varun (Sanjay Dutt) a yogic and a gifted healer. In his mission Varun is supported by his father Pandit Ved Pujan (Kabir Bedi) and researcher Dr. Gayathri (Bipasha Basu).

programme.title: Halla Bol
programme.desc: An aspiring actor from a small town makes his way to the top of the coveted Hindi film industry and attains superstardom. However, his life changes drastically when he becomes the prime witness to a murder but is reluctant to reveal what he has seen.

programme.title: Pathar Ke Insan
programme.desc: A gifted singer Sita and a renowned dancer Lata are two talented sisters who compete to excel in their respective careers. The rivalry between them leads to a competition that has far-reaching psychological consequences.

programme.title: Rudraksh
programme.desc: Bhuria (Sunil Shetty) a contract labourer finds a sacred Rudraksh possessed by Raavan the demon king and thereby acquires supernatural powers. He tries to establish his rule over the universe but is stopped by Varun (Sanjay Dutt) a yogic and a gifted healer. In his mission Varun is supported by his father Pandit Ved Pujan (Kabir Bedi) and researcher Dr. Gayathri (Bipasha Basu).

programme.title: Missing on a Weekend
programme.desc: Seven friends go on a trip to Goa. After a night of partying, one of them is found dead, another becomes unconscious and the rest go missing. Ali, a cop, is given the task of solving this mysterious case.

programme.title: Gandhigiri
programme.desc: Four criminals end up in jail after attempting to rob an NRI’s car. But the NRI is a follower of Gandhi’s philosophy. He bails them out and vows to change their lives.

programme.title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega…
programme.desc: Jahnvi’s best friend Pooja attempts suicide when her boyfriend jilts her. Raj, a struggling singer, saves Pooja but she still goes into a coma and Raj gets stuck into caring for her. Upon recovery, Pooja falls for Raj, but he is in love with Jahnvi.

programme.title: Thodi Thodi Si Manmaaniyan
programme.desc: An obedient middle-class boy battles between wanting to pursue a career in rock music and his mother's dream of studying abroad. In the midst of a dilemma he learns an unsettling truth about his dead father which nearly jeopardises his life.

programme.title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
programme.desc: Raju, a sloppy PI, goes to Europe to investigate a divorce case and falls in love with Anjali, who is covertly impersonating her friend. Raju’s personal and professional lives collide when he thinks that Anjali is the one whom he is investigating.

programme.title: Hello Brother
programme.desc: Vishal, a policeman, gets shot by a business tycoon Khanna. His life is saved via a heart transplant. Upon his recovery, he finds himself working with the spirit of his donor, Hero, to investigate Khanna's drug racket and seek revenge.

programme.title: Phati Padi Hai Yaar
programme.desc: Subjected to repeated rejection and failure, an aspiring actor takes to drinking and womanising to divert his mind. His life collapses further when he finds out that he has caught STD. Will he find the will to live or simply take an easy way out?

programme.title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
programme.desc: Raju, a sloppy PI, goes to Europe to investigate a divorce case and falls in love with Anjali, who is covertly impersonating her friend. Raju’s personal and professional lives collide when he thinks that Anjali is the one whom he is investigating.

programme.title: Bhootwali Love Story
programme.desc: An outspoken and friendly ghost of a woman is in love with a man named Kishore Kumar. Problem arises when she tries to express her feelings and ends up scaring the man more than winning him over. Can a ghost and a human even fall in love?

programme.title: Firaaq
programme.desc: Inspired from the 2002 violence in Gujarat, this drama follows the lives of different people directly or indirectly affected by the riots, from a compassionate woman in an orthodox Gujarati family living with a stone-hearted husband, an urban cross-culture couple with a Hindu wife and a Muslim husband, a poor Muslim couple whose house is charred to ashes during the riots to an old Muslim singer. As their stories unfold and intertwine, we see the harrowing picture of the repercussions of violence in society.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: A philanderer falls in love with a girl who agrees to accept his marriage proposal if he renounces his reckless lifestyle within six months. While he tries hard to accomplish the goal, a young boy ends up at his doorsteps claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Kaagaz Ke Fools
programme.desc: Post a terrible argument with his nagging wife, Purushottam Tripathi quits his job and leaves his home. He finds himself in a shady place where he meets a call girl named Rubina. Meeting Rubina changes his life forever.

programme.desc: From Indias hinterland comes a new music sensation, where popular songs are painted saffron. In the run-up to Indias general elections, were asking: Whats Up With India Obsession with "Hindutva pop"?

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 3
programme.desc: Chef Shagun travels to Nagpur to rustle up tasty treats using the juiciest oranges

programme.title: Episode 1 | Kabhi Kill Kabhi Bill
programme.desc: Two film students Abbaas and Mastan have been hired to make the world’s most viral video.

programme.title: The Farm Life | Fresh Fruit Chaat
programme.desc: The Farm Life has a mixed bag of oranges and lemons for you

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 2
programme.desc: Youve heard of going bananas but this time Shaguns going guavas in search of this fruit. Join her as she visits yet another farm and whips up a tasty treat

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 4
programme.desc: Aaj mosambi bada beimaan hai! Join Shagun as she whips up a fresh, zingy ceviche and a refreshingly tangy sweet-lime mojito

programme.title: Episode 2 | Steven Spielberg Versus Indie Cameraman
programme.desc: The KJo vs Tarantino squabble continues, struggle to make the worlds most viral video. An indie filmmaker makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Official CEOgiri Episode 1
programme.desc: “When you’re falling off a cliff, it doesn’t matter whether you land on your face or your ass!” Dilawar Rana aka D is in deep trouble.

programme.title: Official CEOgiri Episode 4
programme.desc: “Coat ka asteen jitna bada hoga, saanpo ke chipne ke liye jagah bhi utni zyaada hogi.” Kaun hai Dilawar Rana ke asteen ka saanp?

programme.title: Official CEOgiri Episode 3
programme.desc: Its Dilawar Ranas birthday and Mallika has a surprise planned for him! Will it be a happy one?

programme.title: Jurmana
programme.desc: Inder secretly in love with Rama. One day her father find her in Inder's house and force her to leave to Delhi. The train is involved in an accident and everybody believe she is dear. Everybody, expect Inder.

programme.title: Aadat Se Majboor
programme.desc: Dinanath, a devout Hindu, wishes to get his son Shankar married to Salma, an orphan who lives with them. However, Shankar's childhood sweetheart Neetu returns to his life.

programme.title: Disco Dancer
programme.desc: JJimmy promises to return to Bombay and become a famous entertainer so that he can exact revenge on Mr Oberoi for having insulted and imprisoned his mother on false charges.

programme.title: Jurmana
programme.desc: Inder secretly in love with Rama. One day her father find her in Inder's house and force her to leave to Delhi. The train is involved in an accident and everybody believe she is dear. Everybody, expect Inder.

programme.title: Aadat Se Majboor
programme.desc: Dinanath, a devout Hindu, wishes to get his son Shankar married to Salma, an orphan who lives with them. However, Shankar's childhood sweetheart Neetu returns to his life.

programme.title: Disco Dancer
programme.desc: JJimmy promises to return to Bombay and become a famous entertainer so that he can exact revenge on Mr Oberoi for having insulted and imprisoned his mother on false charges.

programme.title: Jurmana
programme.desc: Inder secretly in love with Rama. One day her father find her in Inder's house and force her to leave to Delhi. The train is involved in an accident and everybody believe she is dear. Everybody, expect Inder.

programme.title: Blackmail 1973
programme.desc: Kailash's uncle discovers a formula to save energy, which could make him very wealthy. Mr Mehta, an industrialist, envies his success and devises an evil plan to steal the formula.

programme.title: Banphool
programme.desc: Haria and Gulabi, who are in love, plan to get married to each other, much to the chagrin of Ajay. However, things take a turn when Ajay plans to get Haria killed.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: When Sunny meets his childhood friend Roma, cupid strikes. But Roma's father disapproves of their union and decides to separate them.

programme.title: Do Premee
programme.desc: Young Chetan Prakash and beautiful Payal are in love and would like to marry each other. Their respective fathers, Daulatram and Retired Col. Bhagwant Singh, have other plans and want them to marry the spouses of their choice. So Chetan and Payal decide to elope, and marry on the run.

programme.title: Ek Chitthi Pyar Bhari
programme.desc: A doctor puts out a job posting to recruit a nurse for his clinics in rural India. Unaware of a candidate's dark past, he hires her and eventually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Ek Nazar
programme.desc: Akash, the son of a lawyer, falls in love with a courtesan, Shabnam, when he hears her recite one of his poems. However, a series of obstacles and a mysterious murder threatens to break them apart.

programme.title: Hum Hain Rahi Pyar Ke
programme.desc: Rahul looks after his spoilt nephews, Sunny and Vicky, and niece, Munni. When they go to a funfair, they meet Vyjayanti, who has run away from home, and decide to shelter her without Rahul's consent.

programme.title: Hum Intezaar Karenge
programme.desc: Manisha, a wealthy woman, falls in love with Ajay, a middle-class man, who promises to marry her and settle down within three years. However, after the time period passes, he mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Jeevan Dhaara
programme.desc: Sangeeta, a young woman, must sidetrack her dreams and work tirelessly to provide for her family after her father abandons them.

programme.title: Khuda Gawah
programme.desc: Baadshah Khan falls in love with Benazir, a member of a rival clan who has defeated him in a game of Buzkashi. Benazir will not marry him unless he brings back the head of her father's killer, Habibullah, from India.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Jail movie is based on the prison life. The movie reveals the real life story whatever happens inside the Jail with prisoner. Jail movie is a thrilling prison drama where truth of jail life will come in light.

programme.title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
programme.desc: A movie about the relationships of a womanizing doctor named 'Samir' (Salman Khan) who gets ultimately stuck between two women: a patient with suicidal tendencies named 'Sonia' (Katrina Kaif) and his nurse 'Naina' (Sushmita Sen).

programme.title: Khakee
programme.desc: DCP Anant Shrivastav, along with his team Shekhar Sachdev and Ashwin Gupte, have been assigned to escort dangerous terrorist and ISI agent Iqbal Ansari from Chandigarh to Mumbai.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Jail movie is based on the prison life. The movie reveals the real life story whatever happens inside the Jail with prisoner. Jail movie is a thrilling prison drama where truth of jail life will come in light.

programme.title: Barsaat 2005
programme.desc: Arav, an ambitious married man, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, falls in love with him.

programme.title: Aan Men At Work
programme.desc: DCP Patnaik has to encounter immorality and corruptions in the police forces he is serving and over come the mistrust of his colleagues.

programme.title: Ahista Ahista
programme.desc: For a fee of Rs.200/- Ankush Ramdev provides four witnesses to couples who come to register their marriages at the Registrar of Marriages in Dariyaganj, Delhi.

programme.title: SP Chauhan
programme.desc: Satpal Chauhan, a social worker from Haryana, works for women empowerment and also strives to create an alcohol-free society. However, while pursuing his goals, he faces several hardships.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Patasey
programme.desc: Two people fall in love with each other but are unable to express their feelings. Things take a turn when their parents fix their wedding with other individuals.

programme.title: Shaadi Teri Bajayenge Hum Band
programme.desc: The story mainly builds on confusion and how that creates a huge humorous ruckus that will leave its audience in splits.

programme.title: Sharmaji Ki Lag Gayi
programme.desc: Professor Sharma, a prude man, writes columns for a weekly newspaper about issues related to sex. Things get chaotic in his life when his wife, Shobha, gets eve-teased by a criminal named Lallan.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An undercover agent receives a CD which contains the recording of his kidnapped wife, and is asked to kill the Prime Minister.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Ever since he was 8 years of age, Kunal Mehra wanted to act in Bollywood movies much to his dad's displeasure. but has been not very successful in landing any major part in any movie.

programme.title: Tera Intezaar
programme.desc: A woman sets out to uncover how her lover went missing.

programme.title: Toh Baat Pakki
programme.desc: A pushy busybody invites a young man to be her tenant, in hopes of arranging a marriage for her younger sister; but then has to get rid off him when she believes she has found an even better match. With Tabu and Sharman Joshi. 2010.

programme.title: Traffic Signal
programme.desc: Silsila, a street smart young man, manages the various trades practised at a traffic signal in Mumbai. However, his world comes crashing down when he unknowingly aids in executing a murder.

programme.title: Uvaa
programme.desc: Worried about their future, five wayward teens from remote villages in UP are enrolled in an English medium school in Faridabad by their respective families in order to reform them. But can the youngsters adapt to their new posh surroundings?

programme.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
programme.desc: Veer and Geet fall in love with each other and want to get married. However, they face an obstacle after Geet's peace-loving father sees Veer getting involved in a fight to protect a girl.

programme.title: Barsaat 2005
programme.desc: Arav, an ambitious married man, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, falls in love with him.
